org.golems.ach

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.golems.ach.Channel

  • public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
    An Ach channel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Channel()
      Create a channel with default frame size
      Channel(long frame_size)
      Initialize a channel with a given nominal frame_size.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Channel

        public Channel()
        Create a channel with default frame size

      • Channel

        public Channel(long frame_size)
        Initialize a channel with a given nominal frame_size.
        Parameters:
        frame_size - The frame size is used to preallocate buffers when receiving a message. A mismatch between the value given here and the size of actual messages may result in extra buffer allocation.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public int open(java.lang.String channel_name)
        Open channel with the give channel_name.
        Parameters:
        channel_name - Name of the channel to open
        Returns:
        ach_status code indicating result of the operation

      • close

        public int close()
        Close the channel.
        Returns:
        ach_status code indicating result of the operation

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Close the channel when garbage collected. This will free() C-heap data allocated by open().
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • flush

        public int flush()
        Discard old messages in the channel.
        Returns:
        ach_status code indicating result of the operation

      • flush

        public void flush(int status_mask)
           throws Status.AchException
        Discard old messages in the channel.
        Parameters:
        status_mask - Bit mask of ach_status codes to ignore.

      • get

        public int get(byte[] buf,
      long[] frame_size,
      int options)
        Get buffer from channel.
        Returns:
        ach_status code indicating result of the operation. The number of bytes read is stored in the zeroth element of the frame_size array.
